mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_NO, TO_CHAR(BOOK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOOK_DATE, TO_CHAR(CHECK_IN,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_IN, TO_CHAR(CHECK_OUT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CHECK_OUT, ROOM_PROCESS, MEMBER_NAME, PRICE, BOOK_ADULTCOUNT , BOOK_CHILDCOUNT, (SELECT ROOM_NUM FROM BOOK_ROOM WHERE BOOK_NO=BOOK.BOOK_NO)AS ROOM_NUM, BED_TYPE_NO FROM BOOK JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT DISTINCT ROOM_VIEW_NAME, ROOM_NAME, BOOK.BED_TYPE_NO BED_TYPE_NO,CHECK_IN, CHECK_OUT FROM BOOK JOIN ROOM_VIEW USING(ROOM_VIEW_NO) JOIN ROOM_TYPE USING(ROOM_TYPE_NO) WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM BOOK_ROOM WHERE BOOK_NO=#{bookNo}
